title: League of Legends Game (Mac) Isn't Loading In.
body: So, I've deleted all files of League of Legends and then I re-downloaded the league of legends game, but when I enter, it doesn't work. I'm really scared because I love the game, but at the same time I can't play it. I've contacted issues about this 3 times and I really need someone to help me out. Please, help!                               {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: What exactly is happening when you say it doesn't work? Are you able to get into champion selects and the loading screen never shows, or can you not even get the client open? Hit me up with some details so I know how to approach this!

So, I re downloaded the thing as I said. I downloaded it for my Mac and it had to do the new launch thing. So I waited 15-20 minutes and after it was ready for me to launch and play the game, league of legends was going into the real login screen of the game. I waited 30 minutes - nothing. I'm really worried and I want to get this fixed.

Ahhhh yea that sounds like a different problem than what I was thinking initially. Let's update your Mac Admin settings to make sure League is able to open the files it needs in order to launch. Update those admin settings using [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), and let me know if that helps or not.

So, I have the "Allow user to administer this computer" checked off and as yes and I need to know what to do step by step. I'm kinda not understanding how to fix. Also it says "Read & White" is selected for me. But it isn't loading still.

Sounds like you're having a few problems getting through that guide. Hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to walk you through these steps.
